https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/avfNRBUIlTnJ0cUIbuz12dyf7pl.jpg Lori really needs a break for Christmas. When she sees Patrick Jacobs, a widowed firefighter from Hudson, Wisconsin on a reality cooking show, she feels a strong attraction and decides to take a shot at love, but she's not the only one. A Christmas Wish in Hudson
